kickstart.description:
Cfengine support. We added this for the Ditributed Tera Grid deployment. SDSC is planning on using Rocks with the desktop systems group cfengine reference platform.
The idea is to use the kickstart graph to also describe the cfengine rules, and the pull cfengine rule into kickstart when appropriate.

kickstart.cfengine: # The cfengine scripting should go here, and can be distributed # amount the other XML nodes to take advantage of the graph. Or it # can just be a monilithic file right here.

file.name: /etc/motd
file.eval:
import time
print "cat >> /etc/motd << EOF" print 'Kickstarted on `date`' print 'Profile built at', time.strftime("%I:%M:%S%p %h %d %Y", time.localtime(time.time()))
